summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Jewellery ERP system with offline sync feature. Backend APIs (health, auth, sync) working perfectly. Frontend loads correctly with successful login flow and functional sync status indicator. Minor navigation visibility issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Navigation elements found but not clickable/visible during automated testing
ui_bugs.details: 18 navigation elements detected but appear hidden or have overlay issues preventing clicks

passed_tests: Backend Health API (/api/health) - Status: healthy, Version: 2.0.0
Backend Auth Login (/api/auth/login) - Successfully authenticated admin@jewellery.com
Backend Sync Status (/api/sync/status) - Status: online, 8 collections available
Backend Sync Pull (/api/sync/pull) - Successfully pulled 4 changes
Backend Sync Push (/api/sync/push) - Successfully synced test item
Frontend Loading - Correctly redirects to login page
Frontend Login Form - All elements (email, password, button) present
Frontend Login Flow - Successfully logs in and redirects to dashboard
Frontend Sync Status Indicator - Visible 'Online' status with sync button
Frontend Sync Functionality - Sync button clickable and operations working
Frontend Error Detection - No error messages found
Offline Sync Service - IndexedDB initialized, sync operations functional
